title: The Living Forest (Captioned)
brief_description: As populations expand so do the demands being made on forests to provide living space and forest products. If the forest is to continue to supply our needs, what are the appropriate measures required to conserve it? This program is a detailed study of the ecology of a eucalypt forest and the many plants and animals which make up the forest community.
